name: Automate AI - UC Tech Private Limited
description:
Automate AI, a product of UC Tech Private Limited, is a global leader in WhatsApp API solutions and business messaging automation. Serving enterprises, developers, and organizations across 200 countries, Automate AI is committed to enhancing customer communication and streamlining business operations. Offering secure, reliable, and scalable messaging services, Automate AI helps businesses optimize their customer engagement through its advanced WhatsApp API solutions.

With a focus on innovation, Automate AI provides comprehensive tools that support various use cases, including OTP authentication, order notifications, logistics updates, and customer service interactions. As a trusted product under UC Tech, Automate AI continues to deliver cutting-edge solutions that empower businesses worldwide.
focus_areas: Automate AI is a messaging API created by UC Tech to help global enterprises efficiently reach users around the world using the WhatsApp API
AI Chatbots: Automate customer interactions with intelligent, multilingual chatbots that handle queries, sales, and support on WhatsApp.
Bulk Messaging: Run large-scale, personalized marketing campaigns on WhatsApp to reach and engage thousands of customers.
